channel.title: Suicide seasons
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HhFIwz4iD68
enough said.
[b]lyrics[/b] [quote][We stare at broken clocks, the hands don't turn anymore The days turn into nights, empty hearts and empty places The day you lost him, I slowly lost you too For when he died, he took a part of you
No time for farewells, no chances for goodbyes No explanations, no fucking reasons why I watched it eat you up, pieces fallen on the floor We stare at broken clocks, the hands don't turn anymore
If only sorrow could build a staircase, or tears could show the way I would climb my way to Heaven, and bring him back home again Don't give up hope my friend, this is not the end
We stare at broken clocks, the hands don't turn anymore The days turn into nights, empty hearts and empty places The day you lost him, I slowly lost you too For when he died, he took a part of you
Death is only a chapter So let's rip out the pages of yesterday Death is only a horizon And I'm ready for my sun... I'm ready for my sun to... I'm ready for my sun... I'm ready for my sun to set
This is suicide season!
If only sorrow could build a staircase, or tears could show the way We would climb our way to Heaven, and bring him home again If only sorrow could build a staircase, or tears could show the way We would climb our way to Heaven, and bring him home again
If only sorrow could build a staircase, or tears could show the way We would climb our way to Heaven, and bring him home again We would do anything to bring him back to you We would do anything to end what you're going through
If only sorrow could build a staircase, or tears could show the way I would climb my way to Heaven, and bring him home again I would do anything to bring him back to you Because if you got him back, I would get back the friend that I once knew quote]

item.title: Suicide seasons
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:29, topic:238216”][quote author=sppt link=topic=314451.msg2501486#msg2501486 date=1224699444]
Everytime I look at emo lyrics I just laugh.
It’s all: I WANNA DIE AAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH.
Funny how all people at school seem to think death metal is that, while it clearly isn’t.
[/quote]That’s the IRC, not your school.[/quote]Yeah, it’s like that everywhere. Media have fucked it up totally.

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide seasons
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Metalcore is different.

Death metal is different.

Emo is also a genre for itself.

BTW: Link is dead: This video is no longer available due to a copyright claim by Visible Noise

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide seasons
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:26, topic:238216”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=314451.msg2505106#msg2505106 date=1224887446]
like i stated before, emo = metalcore. Metalcore is only heavier, but with the same bullshit lyrics
[/quote]

Not exactly…

[quote=“Parkway drive - romance is dead”]The incisions in your wrist were all for show.
Just like you.
The epitome of self indulgence.
Another farce.
A charade and another set of crocodile tears.
So serenade her with your last pathetic suicide love song.[/quote]

[quote=“And then I turned seven - goodbye”]
It’s been the years, of abuse.
Neglected to treat the dissorder,
That controls my youth, for so long.
I’m in a fleshy tomb, burried up above the ground.
It’s no use, why should I hold on?
It’s been five years, don’t need one more.[/quote]

The first is pretty much about how emos are pathetic, the second is emo shit.[/quote]Notice how i wrote Bullshit lyrics. I mean what i say, the lyrics have nothing of importance to say, and they sound like they come from a 14 year old.

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide seasons
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Speljohan:

like i stated before, emo = metalcore. Metalcore is only heavier, but with the same bullshit lyrics

Not exactly…

The incisions in your wrist were all for show. Just like you. The epitome of self indulgence. Another farce. A charade and another set of crocodile tears. So serenade her with your last pathetic suicide love song.
It's been the years, of abuse. Neglected to treat the dissorder, That controls my youth, for so long. I'm in a fleshy tomb, burried up above the ground. It's no use, why should I hold on? It's been five years, don't need one more.

The first is pretty much about how emos are pathetic, the second is emo shit.

item.title: Suicide seasons
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:22, topic:238216”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=314451.msg2502607#msg2502607 date=1224770093]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=314451.msg2502571#msg2502571 date=1224764420]

It’s thrash metal not emo, but it’s still shit thrash metal.

Emo is like rites of spring, and then you get the shitty pop-emo junk like mcr, dashboard etc.
[/quote]It’s NOT thrash metal. It’s Metalcore which is basically the same as emo, only worse.

All core bands are bullshit, this genre sucks. It won’t last.
[/quote]Yeah, the only genre there that isn’t a trend is really Grindcore (which is mostly shit anyway)[/quote]
Except for Vegetarian Progressive Grindcore ;D
ie. cattle decapitation!
